label: 副将軍
対訳語: The assistant to a General (Shōgun) or Great General (Dai-Shōgun).
本: Early Japanese History c. 40 B.C.-A.D. 1167,  Part B . Princeton University Press . 1937
説明文: 1. Vice-General 2. The Vice-General or assistant to the General (Shōgun) of the Pacifying-Ezo Headquarters (Chinjufu). However, this post was soon abolished. [将軍、大将軍、蝦夷、鎮守府]
